one.author: Aldous Huxley
one.quote: Technological progress has merely provided us with more effcient means for going backwards

two.author: C.P. Snow
two.quote: Technology...is a queer thig. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other

three.author: Carl Sagan
three.quote: We live in a society equisitely dependent on science and technology, in which hardly anyone knows anything about science and technology.

four.author: John Stuart Mill
four.quote: It is questionable if all the mechanical inventions yet made have lightened the day's toil of any human being.

five.author: Jean Arp
five.quote: Man has tunred his back on silence. Day after day he invents machines and devices that increase noise and distract humanity from the essence of life, contemplation, meditation.
